benchmark_details.name: PeaTMOSS (Pre-Trained Models in Open-Source Software)
benchmark_details.overview: PeaTMOSS dataset comprises metadata for 281,638 pre-trained models, snapshots for 14,296 models with over 50 monthly downloads, and 28,575 open-source software repositories from GitHub that utilize these models, providing a foundational dataset for exploring the PTM supply chain.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable the mining of pre-trained models (PTMs) and open-source software that utilizes these models, along with relationships between them.

data.source: Collected from Hugging Face and PyTorch Hub APIs, along with linked GitHub repositories.
data.annotation: Automatically extracted metadata using large language models.

methodology.calculation: Calculated accuracy of metadata extraction based on manual checks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better quality of metadata extraction.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-3.5-turbo achieved 67.46% accuracy on a sample, improved to 94.39% with GPT-4-turbo.
methodology.validation: Employing stratified sampling to evaluate and enhance data quality.
